name: MEsc Software Engineering
description: Candidate for the Masters of Engineering Science in Software Engineering at the University of Western Ontario. Recipient of the Ontario Graduate Scholarship.

name: BEsc Software Engineering
description: Graduated with Distinction in Software Engineering from the University of Western Ontario. Achieved Dean’s Honor List and the Western Scholarship of Excellence.

name: High School Diploma
description: Graduated from Bayview Glen Independent School in Toronto.

name: Thesis Research
description: Conducted penetration testing on open-source EV charging infrastructure. Developed a Docker-based virtual testbed using the EVerest framework, executed multi-threaded DoS attacks with Bash and Python, and implemented ML-based intrusion detection models.

name: Research Project
description: Using Supervised Machine Learning in an SDN Edge-Controlled IoT Network for Anomaly Detection and Mitigation. Authored the introduction, led a team of five, and designed a detailed presentation to communicate research findings.

name: Teaching Assistantship
description: Teaching Assistant at the University of Western Ontario. Facilitated lab sessions and mentored students in software design, full-stack web development, AWS deployment, JavaFX, and UML design.

projects.title: Software Design (Winter 2024)
projects.description: Facilitated lab sessions, graded assignments, and taught UML, JavaFX, and core software design principles.

projects.title: Web Technologies (Fall 2023)
projects.description: Guided full-stack web development labs, assisted with AWS deployment, and managed student engagement via Discord.

name: Hyperpad (Startup) Software Engineer
description: Software Engineer at Hyperpad responsible for backend, automation, and frontend development. Worked on large-scale projects using GraphQL, Ruby on Rails, Firebase, and Next.js. Automated testing with Cypress.js, Detox, and Cucumber; built responsive UIs with React.js and Next.js.

projects.title: Backend Development
projects.description: Contributed to backend development using Ruby on Rails, GraphQL, and Playwright; built and debugged backend features using Firebase and Next.js.

projects.title: Automation & Testing
projects.description: Developed automated tests using Cypress.js, Detox, and Cucumber pre-processor to streamline workflow efficiency.

projects.title: Frontend Development
projects.description: Built responsive frontend features using React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

name: Sailor Dash
description: A game developed during high school that demonstrated early programming skills and creativity.

name: Val-T
description: Val-T is an online platform for organizing and hosting Valorant tournaments. It automatically collects match data and provides features like leaderboards, player and team statistics, and account management to enhance the competitive experience for players and spectators.

name: HIVE
description: HIVE is an online platform that empowers girls and women to explore and grow in computing through community support and project-based mentorship.

name: RiSync
description: RiSync is a web tool that helps travelers overcome jet lag by providing personalized sleep adjustment plans. It integrates travel and time zone data to recommend optimal sleep and wake times, helping users realign their circadian rhythm after long flights.

name: Travel Buddy
description: Travel Buddy is a gamified travel companion app for children (ages 5–10) to make flying less stressful. It prepares kids for flights through interactive mini-games that simulate airport procedures and highlights geographic landmarks along their journey to keep them engaged. The project won the American Airlines Challenge at TAMUhack 2021.

name: WeGrowth
description: WeGrowth is an interactive mobile game designed to educate young individuals about the climate crisis and financial responsibility through fun gameplay. It makes learning mindful financial decision-making for good causes rewarding and won the Wolfram Alpha Award at SheHacks V 2021.
